import tensorflow as tf
from tensorflow.python.client import device_lib

print("gpu_device_name:\n", tf.test.gpu_device_name())
print("--" * 20)
print("list_physical_devices:\n", tf.config.list_physical_devices('GPU'))
print("--" * 20)
print("list_local_devices:\n", device_lib.list_local_devices())

import os
import tensorflow as tf

mnist = tf.keras.datasets.mnist

(X_train, y_train), (X_test, y_test) = mnist.load_data()
X_train, X_test = X_train.reshape(60000, 28 * 28) / 255.0, X_test.reshape(10000, 28 * 28) / 255.0

model = tf.keras.models.Sequential([
    tf.keras.layers.Dense(128, activation='relu', input_shape=(28 * 28,)),
    tf.keras.layers.Dense(256, activation='relu'),
    tf.keras.layers.Dense(10, activation='softmax')
])
model.compile(optimizer='adam', loss='sparse_categorical_crossentropy', metrics=['accuracy'])
model.fit(X_train, y_train, epochs=20)
model.evaluate(X_test, y_test, verbose=2)
